Name: Karmaphala Wood Bulk Goods Berth
Desc: A large merchant stall that is the first choice of the businesspeople in Port Ormos. When needed, merchants can use these stalls to sell up to 11 types of products while ensuring that they have enough of each type such that they will not have to restock every working day, thus reducing the busywork required to operate.
Source: Purchased from the Sumeru Souvenir Shop
